entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 2:38PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Rising Water Levels and Ice Jam Potential on Interior Rivers... Spring breakup process continues in the Middle Tanana Valley and across the Interior. Warm temperatures last week and over the weekend have produced significant melting of the snowpack. The snow pack melt off water is rapidly making its way into the waterways of the Interior.
